output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: No CMF number is present, but this isn't determinative.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "George Simion" who is Position #2 on the presidential candidates list.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram with an estimated reach of 500,001-1,000,000 people, promoting a march in support of the candidate.
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clear electoral objective: - Uses hashtag #georgesimionpresedinte - Promotes a march specifically in support of George Simion - Uses electoral campaign related hashtags (#alegeri2024 #alegeri) - Timing coincides with presidential election period
5. Journalism: No, this is not journalistic content. It's a direct call to action/event promotion supporting a specific candidate.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an organized campaign activity announcement paid for by a company (SC VIDEO DANCRYS-STUDIO SRL).
The post is clearly electoral propaganda as it meets all criteria from Article 36(7): - Directly refers to a candidate (George Simion) - Used during campaign period - Has clear electoral objective - Exceeds journalistic activity

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Explicitly promotes a presidential candidate - Uses campaign-specific hashtags - Paid advertisement reaching large audience - Organizes campaign activity (march) - Published by a third-party company
conclusion.message-for-police: SC VIDEO DANCRYS-STUDIO SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul George Simion dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala, prin intermediul unei reclame platite pe Facebook (ID: 584647100592642) care promoveaza un mars de sustinere pentru candidatul la presedintie si foloseste hashtag-ul explicit #georgesimionpresedinte. Materialul are un clar obiectiv electoral, fiind difuzat dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, adresandu-se unui public larg estimat intre 500.001 si 1.000.000 de persoane, iar prin continutul sau explicit indeamna la sustinerea unui candidat la functia de presedinte al Romaniei in perioada in care propaganda electorala este interzisa prin lege.
